headline: Valero Energy (VLO) Remains a Top Choice for Hedge Fund Investors
summary: Valero Energy Corporation (NYSE:VLO) is included among the Best Crude Oil Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. The share price of Valero Energy Corporation (NYSE:VLO) slumped despite posting better-than-expected results for its Q2 2025 last week. The company’s adjusted EPS of $2.28 was below the $2.71 it posted in the same period last year, […]
